name: politico

name: politico
text:
New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy told us he wouldn‚Äôt take a position in the Biden administration if he defeats Trump in November‚Äôs election:

‚ÄúI‚Äôm staying right here and we‚Äôre going to stay together and try to get this awful crisis behind us as fast as we can" https://t.co/mQ1NifllwU https://t.co/Mflkfr1Gl1

name: politico
politico
text:
Gov. Phil Murphy on Wednesday accused Trump‚Äôs campaign of ‚Äúfull-throated propaganda‚Äù for filing a lawsuit against New Jersey's plan to hold a mostly vote-by-mail election:

"We will defend our rights vigorously, and we will not back down‚Äù https://t.co/wth54qqoA5 https://t.co/zCEQ7ZzuU3

text:

name: politico
text:
Donald Trump today declined to condemn supporters of QAnon, the fringe conspiracy group that portrays the president as saving the world from an underground child sex ring

https://t.co/k24Vgr7mtn

name: politico
text:
Women are now voting for Democrats at rates never before seen, says @EFRalph. This is obviously a nod to the power women, and women of color especially, now hold in the Democratic Party

Follow our Women Rule Live chat
https://t.co/VQNQj3qlKt

name: politico
text:
Folks are waiting on Hillary Clinton‚Äôs DNC speech tonight with bated breath, says @natashakorecki. Some of the excerpts from her speech seem to telegraph it will be a colorful version of ‚Äúwhat were you all thinking in 2016, America?‚Äù

Women Rule Live chat:
https://t.co/VQNQj3qlKt

name: politico
text:
Hillary Clinton will urge Democrats to take a lesson from her loss four years ago, while Kamala Harris invites them to imagine a different future.

Here's what we‚Äôre watching for tonight during the Dem convention:
https://t.co/XSPUxFs4yN

name: politico
politico
text:
There‚Äôs definitely an acknowledgement among Dems behind the scenes that they are counting on Kamala Harris to close the enthusiasm gap that has been dogging Joe Biden for months, say @apalmerdc.

name: politico
text:
Kamala Harris plans to condemn the ‚Äúconstant chaos‚Äù from the Trump White House when she accepts the VP nomination during tonight's #DemConvention. 

‚ÄúHere‚Äôs the thing: We can do better and deserve so much more,‚Äù she plans to say. https://t.co/82DMvt4taG

text:
Our reporters are pregaming the #DNCConvention.

Watch the livestream hereüëá  https://t.co/vVy2pYheDo

name: politico
text:
Women of color‚Äìparticularly Black women‚Äìhave been held up as a ‚Äúbackbone‚Äù of the Democratic party, @mayaaking adds. And with a woman of color at the top of the ticket, there‚Äôs even more reason for this bloc to show up in November.

Women Rule live chat:

name: politico
text:
The #DNCConvention begins at 9 p.m. ET.

Right now, our reporters are pregaming it with our digital show Foursquare, in which we provide analysis and context to break down where we are and what to expect https://t.co/wtL6IVOjo0

name: politico
text:
Opinion: As viewers continue to abandon the conventions and it becomes more and more of a niche product, it‚Äôs inevitable the conventions will become streamed, on-demand programs that the networks make reference to and air clips from but don‚Äôt really cover

https://t.co/PN3POpyCe1

name: politico
text: Coronavirus outbreaks in schools are wrecking Trump's plans for a return to normal. Thousands of students and teachers are getting sick, triggering mass quarantines, campus closures and last-minute switches to online learning. https://t.co/4KBkA3qit7

name: politico
text:
President Trump confirmed today that he would demand that the United Nations reimpose all of the body‚Äôs sanctions on Iran, triggering a so-called snapback mechanism that could end the nuclear deal that he withdrew from in 2018

https://t.co/l3JyhTib7W

name: politico
text:
How will next week's Republican convention differ from what we're seeing at the Dem Convention? @PoliticoCharlie  says it will be quite a contrast. Just as Biden emphasizes empathy, Trump will want to convey resolute strength

Follow our DNC live analysis: https://t.co/aIiV9sPP3C https://t.co/qcAqQtiox5

name: politico
text:
The health care system that emerges from the pandemic will be fundamentally different, and technology will play a significant role in shaping it. Our Future Pulse newsletter covers the collision of health care and technology. Subscribe today.
https://t.co/g1TBSURK83 https://t.co/TnO2qQuUd0

name: politico
text:
This segment on climate change also doubles as outreach to young people, says @hollyotterbein, which has been missing at the convention so far. 

(As a headline on our website read today, ‚ÄúConvention takes a turn toward old white senators.‚Äù)
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text:
On climate change, there is remarkable agreement between moderates and progressives on the issue right now.

When Biden and  Sanders' teams formed "unity" task forces, both sides said the climate change panel was one where they found the most accord
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text:
Hillary Clinton mentioned Bernie Sanders positively very briefly during her DNC speech tonight. There‚Äôs some party unity for you, says @hollyotterbein.

During the 2020 primary, a documentary was released in which she said about Sanders, ‚ÄúNobody likes him‚Äù
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is speaking now at the #DemConvention. Watch live: https://t.co/FX8ZQtGcU2

name: politico
text:
Fun fact: This is Nancy‚Äôs Pelosi‚Äôs 15th convention, says @PoliticoCharlie. She first attended the 1952 convention in Chicago as a child with her parents. (Her father was a congressman from Maryland and also mayor of Baltimore).

More DNC live analysis:

name: politico
text:
‚ÄúWe are at a crossroads,‚Äù former Arizona Rep. Gabby Giffords said tonight during her DNC address. ‚ÄúWe can let the shooting continue, or we can act. We can protect our families ... We can be on the right side of history‚Äù

More key moments from DNC Night 3: https://t.co/r7ewKgAEQg https://t.co/zoLDVvxkJH

name: politico
text:
The domestic violence video in tonight's DNC was designed to highlight Biden‚Äôs role in passing the Violence Against Women Act. He's held that up on the campaign trail up as a crowning achievement, says @natashakorecki.

Live #DemConvention analysis: https://t.co/KECzd0s9Aq

name: politico
text:
Biden's campaign has also leaned on his work with the Violence Against Women's Act when he's faced some serious allegations, including unwanted touching and more serious assault allegations leveled by Tara Reade, notes @natashakorecki.

Live DNC analysis: https://t.co/KECzd0s9Aq

name: politico
text:
The domestic violence conversation in tonight's DNC is also timely because of the pandemic, says reporter @stephanie_murr. There was concern in the spring that domestic violence was on the rise due to Covid-19 and social distancing restrictions.

https://t.co/KECzd0s9Aq

name: politico
text:
RT @sarahnferris: Biden's work on Violence Against Women Act getting lots of attention tonight.

Just a reminder that the authorization for this bill actually *lapsed* in 2019. House and Senate can't agree on a bipartisan version.Biden's work on Violence Against Women Act getting lots of attention tonight.

Just a reminder that the authorizati‚Ä¶ https://t.co/ENqmyGNrUR

name: politico
text: Elizabeth Warren is choosing to focus her #DemConvention speech tonight on child care, which was another focus on the trail as she built an enthusiastic base with a lot of women voters, says reporter @AlxThomp. https://t.co/KECzd0s9Aq

name: politico
text:
President Trump may rail against mail-in ballots in public, but state and local Republicans are quietly telling Americans that‚Äôs exactly how they should vote

https://t.co/iSiDWVeX1d

name: politico
text:

Follow our DNC live analysis:
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text:
Clinton didn't shy away from the bitter nature of her 2016 defeat when urging Americans to have an "overwhelming" turnout at the polls to defeat Trump:

‚ÄúDon‚Äôt forget,‚Äù she said, ‚ÄúJoe and Kamala can win by 3 million votes and still lose. Take it from me" https://t.co/ZfGUgp5MC9 https://t.co/5auUArTEPu

name: politico
text:
In a video for the DNC, 11-year-old Estela Juarez addressed Donald Trump: 

‚ÄúMy dad thought you would protect military families so he voted for you in 2016, Mr. President. He says he won't vote for you again after what you did to our family‚Äù https://t.co/r7ewKgAEQg https://t.co/I7vfl6RgHH

name: politico
text: Kamala Harris is speaking now at the #DemConvention. Watch her accept the vice presidential nomination: https://t.co/tscRuxvWDI

name: politico
text:
The video showing more of Kamala Harris‚Äô family life is what advisers really wanted to elevate tonight at the #DemConvention. They feel there‚Äôs a side of her that even Dems who‚Äôve followed the campaign closely don‚Äôt know enough about, says @natashakorecki
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text:
We just heard a vice presidential nominee, probably for the first time in history, use the words ‚Äústructural racism‚Äù ‚Äì and discuss it at length in their acceptance speech, says @PoliticoCharlie 

DNC live analysis:
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text:
Advisers wanted Kamala Harris to build out more of her personal narrative tonight. That‚Äôs why so much of the beginning was built around her mother. She was doing the same showing her connection with Beau Biden, says @natashakorecki.

DNC live analysis:
https://t.co/2ZxK6mOyyD

name: politico
text:
Tonight and yesterday, Joe Biden‚Äôs campaign spotlighted: 

‚úîÔ∏èhealth care
‚úîÔ∏èclimate change
‚úîÔ∏èimmigration
‚úîÔ∏ègun control
‚úîÔ∏èthe economic recovery

That implicitly implies those are his priorities if he‚Äôs elected, said @hollyotterbein. More DNC live analysis:
